comment: A detailed EIDO for complex incidents. The LLM agent should populate all fields, including comments, based on the source text.

incidentComponent.comment: Core details about the incident itself.

locationComponent.comment: The primary location of the incident.
locationComponent.locationDescriptionText: WHERE: A detailed text description of the location.

personComponent.comment: Placeholder for a suspect involved in the incident. Remove if none.

ncPersonComponent.nc:PersonPhysicalDescriptionText: Details about the suspect's appearance, clothing, etc.

personComponent.comment: Placeholder for a victim involved in the incident. Remove if none.

ncPersonComponent.nc:PersonPhysicalDescriptionText: Details about the victim, including injuries.

notesComponent.comment: A concise summary of the core event.
notesComponent.notesActionComments: WHAT: A summary of the core event that occurred.

notesComponent.comment: Key temporal and contextual information about the incident.
notesComponent.notesActionComments: WHEN/DATE: [Event Timestamp]. MOTIVE: [Motive, if known]. STATUS: [Current status of the incident/investigation].
